newsitem.title: CHINA: China says to cancel visits with Denmark.
newsitem.headline: China says to cancel visits with Denmark.

text.p: China said on Tuesday it was cancelling a planned exchange of visits between Chinese and Danish officials in retaliation against Denmark's decision to table a motion censuring Beijing's human rights in the U.N.

"China...will delay important exchanges of officials that are under discussion and halt exchanges and cooperation with Denmark on human rights," Foreign Ministry spokesman Shen Guofang told a news briefing.

He accused Denmark of interfering in China's internal affairs over its decision to table a resolution in the United Nations Human Rights Commission in Geneva to censure Beijing for its human rights record.
Bilateral relations would suffer as a result, Shen said. "They must change their confrontational method," he said.
The resolution is due to come up for discussion on Tuesday.
